heading: Purchase AcidBase Tokens
detail: Acidbase tokens available for purchase with ETH during presale on a secure platform with a user-friendly interface.

heading: Connect wallet to the Acidbase Platform
detail: Connect your wallet after token purchase for seamless management and access to AI-driven digital persona creation on Acidbase.

heading: Share Personal Data and Train Your AI Model
detail: Submit personal data, chat, and refine AI model to create an accurate digital persona of your thoughts, emotions, and personality.

heading: Feature Extraction and Data Representation
detail: Acidbase utilizes advanced NLP and computer vision models to extract features from text, image, and audio data, capturing your essence.

heading: Model Training and Personalization
detail: Acidbase personalizes AI models using user-specific data, employing transfer learning for unique characteristics and continuous improvement.

heading: Model Storage, Deployment, and Blockchain Integration
detail: AI models containerized with Docker are deployed on AWS or GCP, while Ethereum blockchain ensures secure data storage and access control.

heading: Tokenization and Access to Your Trained AI Model
detail: Tokenize your AI model as a unique NFT, ensuring secure access to your AI-driven digital persona and managing your digital legacy.

heading: User Interaction and Engagement
detail: Engage with preserved loved ones, share wisdom, and learn from historical figures through Acidbase's AI interface.
